block.p: Dr. Claire Elizabeth Wolfteich and John Frederick Griffin Jr. are to be married today at St. Ignatius of Loyola Church in Chestnut Hill, Mass. The Rev. Robert F. VerEecke is to perform the Roman Catholic ceremony.

The bride, 32, is an assistant professor of practical theology and spiritual formation at the Boston University School of Theology. She graduated cum laude from Brown University and received a master's degree in divinity and a Ph.D. in theology from the University of Chicago. She also received a certificate in pastoral formation from St. Patrick's College in Maynooth, Ireland. She is a daughter of Alice Wolfteich of Atlantic Beach, N.Y., and the late Paul A. Wolfteich.
